website_summaries.verdict: A classic tripod for cooking that is built well and includes a bag for storage.
pros: Storage bag included helps keep the tripod handy and protects it when not in use
cons: The height on this model is  quite short for larger fires

customer_reviews.title: This does NOT come with the dutch over as pictures
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not reading it better. Their fault for not making it more clear. The dutch oven is pictured in the product picture. The descriptive headline does say "Tripod Stand with Chain and Bag." But I do think in their description they could have stated the dutch oven as pictured is not included.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tripod for camping
customer_reviews.text: I love this tripod and it comes with a carrying bag to keep the chain and hook from getting lost when traveling with it. It sets up very easily and holds my dutch ovens securely and without bending in on the tripod legs. Very pleased with the product and would highly recommend it to anyone who needs it for camping or cooking in the great outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: NEA Sound

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow way more then I expected. Read some reviews before I purchased. Thick solid legs and the chain is thick as well. Would I buy again damn straight I'd put my money on it again. Not disappointed at all. "That's what she said"
customer_reviews.author: eric..

customer_reviews.title: great investment
customer_reviews.text: To many nights we have spent fiddling with the dutch oven over the camp fire. My father made one of these for my mother and I would never have the heart to tell them but mine is way better. I set this up in my living room to test hanging the pot on it. I didnt want to give it the trial run in the heat. I have a 150 pound English mastiff that ran into it chasing our cat and the thing didnt budge. We ended up camping during Hurricane Sandy and the thing still held up our dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosia.Cle

customer_reviews.title: perfection for your cast iron cookery
customer_reviews.text: Well built and strong. Doesn't mind being IN the fire pit. Adjustable height via chain with hook. Must have a very good pair of gloves, and consider a Lid Lifter for your cast iron dutch ovens. Prepared many a campsite meal or leisure snack hanging from this stand. Considered other brands but settled on this one because of positive reviews. Storage sleeve works fine if you don't rough it up too much. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Dinner on the tripod.
customer_reviews.text: This tripod stand is perfect. Well worth the money. I have my heaviest cast iron kettle on this item with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: High quality and I'm pretty sure it's made of steel, not cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: This thing will last several lifetimes, at least. It appears to be powder coated black so the chances of it ever rusting are almost zero unless you leave it submerged in saltwater for a decade or two. I'm too lazy to look up what it's weight rating is but I have an 8 quart cast iron pot that I've filled to the brim with food/liquid and this tripod has no problem supporting the weight (easily 30+ pounds from what I've tested but I'd have no issues putting upwards of 100 pounds on this thing as long as the legs were firmly planted in the ground).
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality metal and sturdy even comes with a carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: paul ray parker jr

customer_reviews.title: Temp Fish Racks in AK
customer_reviews.text: Got two sets to use as a temp fish rack while cutting fish after setting net. Work great! With the higher hook and lower chain we can set to long sticks/logs up to use as two racks for drying fish.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten T.

customer_reviews.title: Part of a set.
customer_reviews.text: For Christmas we got a lot of iron cookware. We already had a lot, but I wanted a whole system to use independent of the rest. Got a huge dutch oven, tripod, lid lifter, insert and lid stand. We love the way food tastes when cooked over an open fire and iron does it better than anything else. This si part of a set that will last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Ford

customer_reviews.title: If you have a pot with two handles setup will ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a pot with two handles setup will be a little more difficult than if you have a pot with a wire handle that can hook to a chain with hook.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoor Cooking
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when I purchased this tripod. I do a lot of outdoor cooking and was looking for something durable enough to hold my Dutch Oven. I have made campfire stew and good old fashioned baked beans - New England style, of course... It works as advertised..... Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Serenity...

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy; my 18" cast iron dutch oven, with lid, filled with food didn't bobble a bit. The supplied chain and double hooks allows anything hung to be moved to the height needed, from right on the fire to about two foot above. The bag is handy for putting it away without getting soot marks on the trunk lining.
customer_reviews.author: D. N. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Bayou Classic 7485, Tripod Stand with Chain and Bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend, he told me it was exactly what he needed for his camping trips. That was what I wanted to here, and I seem to recall that it was not all the expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a few of these and picked this one mainly because it came with the carrying case. It is priced similar to the others. Ordered from Amazon because of the free shipping (odd length and weight). Since, I have purchased another. I use the two in conjunction with a 6 foot long cold steel piece which rests nicely on the hooks. This enables me to have a dutch oven rack with lots of space, and no pounding into the ground. Or for smaller applications, use just the tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tripod for Lodge ovens over an open fire
customer_reviews.text: We use this easy to set up tripod over a propane fire pit to cook in our dutch oven. The tripod is sturdy, folds up easily, and comes with a heavy duty chain that allows you to adjust the height of the oven over the fire. No reason to pay any more. This tripod works great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy and well made. It even comes with a nice zippered storage bag. You'll have to drop by Home Depot to pick up about a foot of heavy link chain though (about $2) as it does not come with the product. This is a great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Crafter

customer_reviews.title: I love mine and you will too !
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time . Good quality and easy to store .
customer_reviews.author: t.a.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Used it over a fire with an 8 qt dutch oven. Worked perfectly. I suggest getting a handle/hook thing to remove said dutch oven to prevent setting your hand on fire. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Dustin W

customer_reviews.title: nice product. Works best in State Parks where you ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, nice product. Works best in State Parks where you have to place it on a raised fire ring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy .. but will last a life time
customer_reviews.text: These things are made of cast iron so they weigh a ton. On the plus side.. because they are made of cast iron .. these will be the last that I'll have to buy unless I forget them.
customer_reviews.author: Overlander

customer_reviews.title: the carry bag is a nice feature and is one of the reasons I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty steel, thick chain, the carry bag is a nice feature and is one of the reasons I purchased it. It is a little shorter than I expected but that was just my own perception, guess it looked taller in the ad. I don't see it not working ok though. I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: American Survivor

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift and he loved it. We also bought the cast iron pot ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and he loved it. We also bought the cast iron pot to go along with it. Lots of yummy dinners on the campfire!
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid tripod. Works great with my camp dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: Michael GrantTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is great to have when cooking over a fire. We use it a lot and it is easy to adjust , which is important also.
customer_reviews.author: melony

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This serves it's purpose perfectly. Make sure your dutch oven has a handle that will fit into an S hook on the stand's chain!
customer_reviews.author: Slappy

customer_reviews.title: camping buddy
customer_reviews.text: Great price, solid construction, also included with the tripod was a bag to put it in, and the chain to hold the dutch oven. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Alan Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat for this type of outdoor cooking! It works like a champ, I highly recommend this tripod size!
customer_reviews.author: John Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my new favorite toys! Works great for making chili or stew (etc). First time I used it I was able to leave a chowder over the fire for hours and keep it warm while everyone staggered into camp.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Hogue

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for your camping gear. I was nervous the legs might be too short but the length is just right and it easily fits back into the carrying pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, solid, love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing works perfect and I couldn't imagine it could be made any better then it is. Came with bag and chain.
customer_reviews.author: joey joe joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Tripod. Heavy duty, 1/2" rod with chain and hook
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ehrler

customer_reviews.title: The winners
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's Scout Cooking competition. They won first place. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant ordering this item online, but it paid off. It is just what it needs to be to be usuable.
customer_reviews.author: RD4

customer_reviews.title: Stays in the car!!
customer_reviews.text: It's so thin and skinny that I keep it in my trunk, ready for impromptu camping trips. It's excellent for dutch ovens. We absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: elizzrdbeth

customer_reviews.title: tripod
customer_reviews.text: Made of heavy iron and folds easily, works well with dutch oven. Slightly clumsy to set up but works well and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Nice tripod
customer_reviews.text: I have used my tripod many many times and cooked lots of different meals. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Booper

customer_reviews.title: Then some!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a dutch oven tripod for my campfire cooking. Bayou Canyon 7485 tripod was listed with chain to hold the oven over the fire. Just what I needed, but to my pleasant surprise, it came with the bag. The bag is a very needed item . Making for easy transport by containing the legs amd chain. Quality as good, price better andI then some, the bag.
customer_reviews.author: patchouli

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my cast iron dutch oven as part of our camping year. Works very well hold it in place
customer_reviews.author: A. REISE

customer_reviews.title: Let's go camping!
customer_reviews.text: My Scout Master Husband finally got the Christmas gift he'd be waiting for and he loves it! Let's go camping!
customer_reviews.author: Tinker Bell

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and can definitely hold decent size pot, grate, etc. My only complaint is as a few others mentioned - the unit is a bit short for anything more than small campfire.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Tripod @ Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do @ a price far below others. Carrying bag is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: andrewski

customer_reviews.title: great tripod
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny and is nice and sturdy. For what it's worth, mine did come with a chain and the carrying bag is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Bill I.

customer_reviews.title: out door camping
customer_reviews.text: solidly built, legs are long enough. Bag is a nice accessory and makes carrying the product around much easier. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to use it yet but it seems very sturdy and will hold a full dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: J Clement

customer_reviews.title: Bayou Classic Tripod
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty tripod & chain with hook, it will last forever, high recommend we use them a lot while scouting
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect on are last camping trip, and it has its own case as well as the chain.. well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: CClayton

customer_reviews.title: t
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and handles an 8qt oven very easily. Folds for easy storage. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Magness

customer_reviews.title: Tri Pod
customer_reviews.text: Only used once but perfect - do not see why will not continue to meet my needs - received all items in very good shape - recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd noia

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was Very satisfied with my purchase, I received it in a timely manner and it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Dutch Oven tripod
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is exactly what I expected, great, very good price. Fast delivery from Amazon as always
customer_reviews.author: Dieter Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod.
customer_reviews.text: This tripod works great with my camp chef canyon national park 12 quart dutch oven. We use it over an open fire cooking beans and roasts.
customer_reviews.author: 29again

customer_reviews.title: It is nice to have a storage bag to keep everything neat ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks well built. Can't wait to try it out. It is nice to have a storage bag to keep everything neat and tidy
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hollis

customer_reviews.title: The tripod is fine but the bag came with mold all over it
customer_reviews.text: The tripod is fine but the bag came with mold all over it. It's not usable at all. The tripod itself has scratches all over it. Possibly a used item? It's very frustrating because it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Iffy
customer_reviews.text: Don't know yet looks low but will know more this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron O.

customer_reviews.title: Tri Pods.
customer_reviews.text: It works! I would recommend this product to anyone in the world. Now I just need 20 words and I'm done!
customer_reviews.author: Dom Mancusae

customer_reviews.title: seems to be solid
customer_reviews.text: This was an X mas gift, so I have not used it yet, however it seems to be built solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bayou Classic 7485, Tripod Stand with Chain and Bag
product_meta.description: Create the essence of bayou living with Bayou Classic outdoor cooking equipment. Use this sturdy Tripod Stand positioned over campfires or gas cookers to suspend Bayou Cast Iron Cookware. Perfect for camping, tailgating, scouting, or backyard cooking adventures.
feature_bullets: The Package Height Of The Products Is 15. 0" Inches
The Package Length Of The Products Is 20. 0" Inches
The Package Width Of The Products Is 20. 0" Inches
